RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Possui graduaзгo em Direito pela Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (1976) e й Especialista em Direito (1991) pelo Programa de Pуs-Graduaзгo em Direito da Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (PPGD/UFPE). Iniciou a atividade de magistйrio superior na Faculdade de Direito de Olinda (1979). Foi professor da Escola Superior da Magistratura de Pernambuco (ESMAPE - 1987) e da Universidade Catуlica de Pernambuco (1987 a 1990). Atuou como professor de curso de pуs-graduaзгo na Fundaзгo do Ensino Superior de Pernambuco. Desde 1990, й professor efetivo da Universidade Federal de Pernambuco, Faculdade de Direito do Recife, onde jб lecionou a disciplina direito comercial e atualmente ensina direito administrativo. Em paralelo a sua vida acadкmica, jб atuou no Ministйrio Pъblico Federal e na magistratura estadual. A partir de 1987, passou a exercer a magistratura federal, atuando por vinte anos na primeira instвncia e, em 2007, foi promovido a Desembargador Federal do Tribunal Federal da Quinta Regiгo, funзгo que atualmente exerce. Foi Desembargador Eleitoral do Tribunal Regional Eleitoral de Pernambuco. Possui experiкncia em Direito Comercial e Direito Pъblico, particularmente Direito Administrativo e Direito Constitucional. Proferiu diversas palestras em eventos jurнdicos. Tem artigos publicados. Integra grupos de pesquisa na Faculdade de Direito do Recife. Й membro da Academia Pernambucana de Letras Jurнdicas.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Graduated in Law from the Federal University of Pernambuco (1976) and is a Specialist in Law (1991) from the Graduate Program in Law at the Federal University of Pernambuco (PPGD/UFPE). He began teaching higher education at the Faculty of Law of Olinda (1979). He was a professor at the Escola Superior da Magistratura de Pernambuco (ESMAPE-1987) and at the Catholic University of Pernambuco (1987 to 1990). He worked as a professor of a postgraduate course at the Fundaзгo do Ensino Superior de Pernambuco. Since 1990, he has been a professor at the Federal University of Pernambuco, Recife Faculty of Law, where he has taught commercial law and currently teaches administrative law. In parallel with his academic life, he has worked in the Federal Public Ministry and in the state judiciary. From 1987, he began to exercise the federal judiciary, working for twenty years in the first instance and, in 2007, he was promoted to Federal Judge of the Federal Court of the Fifth Region, a position he currently holds. He was Electoral Judge of the Regional Electoral Court of Pernambuco. He has experience in Commercial Law and Public Law, particularly Administrative Law and Constitutional Law. He has given several speeches at legal events. He has published articles. He integrates research groups at the Recife Faculty of Law. He is a member of the Pernambuco Academy of Legal Letters.
